thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1795
thread.title: Jacob

author: Jacob
title: Jacob
text: First time I used FlightHub, I saved both money and a huge headache. I was trying to cobble together an affordable, convenient return flight under $1000) from Toronto to Tocumen in Panama City --which is far from easy. Another search engine had found one but then suddenly increased the ticket price by several hundred dollars! FlightHub not only found a good flight but also one which started, not in Toronto (300km away), but in Sarnia (ON), which is where I live. So I save an 8-hour return drive, plus the fuel and the cost of a one night hotel room in Toronto! Plus they stuck with the price they Quote: d me. I couldn't be happier (and I'm not normally easy to please). You can make it hard on yourself by selecting a fly-by-night, but I'll go with FLIGHTHUB!!
